SEARCH
Package env.objects.resources

Class Resource

java.lang.Object
env.objects.resources.Resource
Direct Known Subclasses:
Princess
public abstract class Resource extends Object
The base class for all resources on the map (e.g., princesses). Defines common properties and behaviors shared by all resources.

  • Constructor Details

    • Resource

      public Resource(String name, boolean team, Pose pose)
      Constructs a new Resource with the specified name, team, and pose.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the resource.
      team - true if the resource belongs to the red team, false for blue.
      pose - the initial position and orientation of the resource.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the resource.
      Returns:
      the name of the resource.

    • getTeam

      public boolean getTeam()
      Returns the team this resource belongs to.
      Returns:
      true if the resource belongs to the red team, false for blue.

    • getPose

      public Pose getPose()
      Returns the pose (position and orientation) of the resource.
      Returns:
      the pose of the resource.

    • setPose

      public void setPose(Pose pose)
      Sets the pose (position and orientation) of the resource.
      Parameters:
      pose - the new pose for the resource.

    • isCarried

      public boolean isCarried()
      Checks if the resource is currently being carried by an agent.
      Returns:
      true if the resource is carried, false otherwise.

    • pickedUp

      public void pickedUp()
      Marks the resource as picked up (carried).
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the resource is already carried.

    • dropped

      public void dropped()
      Marks the resource as dropped (no longer carried).

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the resource.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of the resource, including its name and pose.
